name: Sixtieth Kilometer
description: You're going to work by train, but strange things happens on the way: the train stops, the pink fog appears outside and the man who came off the train immediately dies. The main characters turned out to be locked in the train without any clues about what's happening...
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 8, 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c

reviews.review_text: I liked the plot of this novel. It was interesting to follow the story and the characters. Good luck to the developers for their future projects!
